pullrequest.title: Replace std::strings with uint32_t as robot addresses

content.raw:
Yes, the teams will have to do the following changes:

* Replace `std::string` with `uint32_t` in the `OnDataReceived()` callback.
* Replace the string-based destination address in `SendTo()` with a numerical destination in the case of a unicast address. Multicast or broadcast addresses shouldn't be affected.
content.html:
Yes, the teams will have to do the following changes:

  • Replace std::string with uint32_t in the OnDataReceived() callback.
  • Replace the string-based destination address in SendTo() with a numerical destination in the case of a unicast address. Multicast or broadcast addresses shouldn't be affected.
